summary: This document is an email chain forwarded to law enforcement, containing a lengthy, unsolicited report from Okeisha Austin alleging a vast conspiracy involving geospatial brain-computer interfaces, Wikipedia manipulation, and organized crime to obstruct the Jeffrey Epstein case and other legal matters. The author claims personal victimization and connects numerous individuals and entities to the alleged scheme.

persons.name: Okeisha Austin
persons.context: The author of the primary email, alleging she is a victim of a vast conspiracy involving stalking, hacking, and obstruction related to the Epstein case and other matters. She claims to have been targeted due to her former employment.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The central figure in the case to which this correspondence is related. The author claims her allegations support cases connected to him.

persons.name: Delbra Richardson Price
persons.context: Described as the biological aunt of Russell Simmons and the former boss of Okeisha Austin at Del Richardson and Associates, Inc. (DRA, Inc.). Claimed to have significant political connections.

persons.name: Russell Simmons
persons.context: Mentioned as the nephew of Delbra Richardson Price, connected to Def Comedy Jam.

persons.name: Michael "MJ" Gottlieb
persons.context: Associated with Hustle Branding, Inc. in New York. The author connects him to Daymond John and alleges his page referred to as "DISNEYLAND."

persons.name: Daymond John
persons.context: Co-founder of FUBU and Shark Tank investor. The author alleges she was invited to a private book signing for his "Power of Broke" book, which she describes as part of a scam and connects him to a "social justice tour" used for obstruction.

persons.name: Kristopher McCarthy
persons.context: Named as a man who hacks, connected to Chris John Mott and a group of men. The author provides his address and suggests investigating him will reveal connections to the case.

persons.name: Chris John Mott
persons.context: Associated with "Mottivation" based in Colorado. Alleged to be infiltrating churches and connected to Kristopher McCarthy.

persons.name: Sheriff Mike Corona
persons.context: An Orange County Sheriff mentioned. The author claims she met him organically and that her former office is connected to his case.

persons.name: Barak Obama
persons.context: Mentioned as someone known by the author's former boss, Delbra Richardson Price, and alleged to be used by conspirators to hide their scams. Daymond John is noted as the USA Business Entrepreneur under Obama.

persons.name: Prophet Manasseh "Yakim" Jordan
persons.context: Described as a Christian prophet connected to Reverend Joseph Simmons (Rev. Run). The author accuses him of hacking devices to gather information for prophecies and being connected to the alleged conspiracy.

persons.name: Reverend Joseph Simmons
persons.context: Referred to as Rev. Run, mentioned as being mentored by the Jordan family.

persons.name: Aaron Gottlieb
persons.context: Listed in "USA vs. Aaron Gottlieb (NYC)" as a potentially linked case.

persons.name: Andrew Gottlieb
persons.context: Listed in "USA vs. Andrew Gottlieb (NYC)" as a potentially linked case.

persons.name: Eric Boyd
persons.context: Listed in "USA vs. Eric Boyd" as a potentially linked case.

persons.name: Dwight Shelton
persons.context: Mentioned alongside Joseph Little in connection to scams involving billionaires.

persons.name: Joseph Little
persons.context: Mentioned alongside Dwight Shelton in connection to scams involving billionaires.

persons.name: Robert Snyder
persons.context: Mentioned in relation to a scam involving "Neuvo Riche" and a former business partner, leading to a new entity called Renatus LLC.

persons.name: Allen Johnson
persons.context: Listed in "USA vs. Allen Johnson (Colorado)" as a potentially linked case.

persons.name: John Meloni-Minelli
persons.context: A man connected to the "Sherif Mike Conon matter" whom the author met at church.

persons.name: Eve Mazarella
persons.context: Listed in "USA vs. EVE Mazarella based out of San Diego, CA" as a potentially linked case, with alleged connections to the MOB and Florida.

persons.name: Sheriff Reed
persons.context: A sheriff based out of Orange County mentioned as being connected to the alleged conspiracy.

persons.name: Judge King
persons.context: A judge in courtroom C45 at Santa Ana Superior Court. The author mentions being steered toward jury duty in his courtroom for a murder case.

connections.description: Austin states she was formerly employed by Delbra Richardson Price at Del Richardson and Associates, Inc. (DRA, Inc.).
Price is described as the biological aunt of Russell Simmons.
The author connects Gottlieb to Daymond John, implying a business or social association.
McCarthy is alleged to be connected to Chris John Mott and his group.
Austin claims her former boss, Price, knows Barack Obama and had unique access to Cuba.
The author notes Daymond John was the "USA Business Entrepreneur under Barak Obama."
The Jordan family is said to have mentored Reverend Joseph Simmons (Rev. Run).

events.title: Okeisha Austin's Report Submission
events.description: Okeisha Austin sends a detailed, unsolicited report alleging a vast conspiracy to obstruct the Jeffrey Epstein case and other legal matters through high-tech means and organized crime.

events.title: VIP Book Signing Event
events.description: Okeisha Austin describes being personally selected and invited to a VIP event, which turned out to be a private book signing for Daymond John's "Power of Broke" book, framed as a scavenger hunt. She later characterizes this as part of a scam.

events.title: Jury Duty Steering
events.description: Austin claims she was steered toward being a juror in a murder case in Judge King's courtroom (C45, Santa Ana Superior Court) involving an Italian cruise line and a victim named "Mickey," while allegedly equipped with a hidden wire to obstruct the case.

keyFacts: The document is an unsolicited, forwarded email from Okeisha Austin containing wide-ranging and technologically complex conspiracy allegations related to obstructing the Jeffrey Epstein case.
The author alleges a system using "geospatial Brain Computer Interface Screws," Wikipedia page manipulation, and a "lottery" system to sabotage legal cases and evidence.
Austin claims personal victimization, including stalking, hacking of her DNA records and devices, and a campaign to destroy her reputation and employment opportunities.
She connects numerous individuals from business (Daymond John, Michael Gottlieb), her former workplace (Delbra Richardson Price), and alleged hackers (Kristopher McCarthy) to the conspiracy.
The email was forwarded to law enforcement per a practice of conveying civilian information regarding Epstein.
